page.title: 09Education In Notgrove
page.content:
Less than 20 children live in the area. For children under 5 there is a play group in Cold Aston 2km away. The infants and juniors attend school at Cold Aston, parents on a rota take the children by car. The over 11 age group go either to the Bourton Vale Comprehensive, 4km away or to Northleach Grammar School, 8km away, they are taken by Pulhams coaches. The nearest technical college is at Cheltenham 20km away. For Sunday school, children have to go to surrounding villages.
A little while ago in the cottage next to the Post Office, where a child had died, the sound of footsteps and the cries of a child were heard and reported.
